code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import'../styles/Hero.css';import{FontAwesomeIcon}from'@fortawesome/react-fontawesome';import pic from'../Assets/pic.jpg';import{faLinkedin,faGithub}from'@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const roles=['Software Engineer','AI / ML Engineer','Full-Stack Developer','Cloud & DevOps Engineer'];const Hero=()=>{const[roleIndex,setRoleIndex]=useState(0);const[fade,setFade]=useState(true);useEffect(()=>{const interval=setInterval(()=>{setFade(false);setTimeout(()=>{setRoleIndex(prev=>(prev+1)%roles.length);setFade(true);},400);},3000);return()=>clearInterval(interval);},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{id:"home",className:"hero",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"hero-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Shivani Atukuri"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{className:"hero-role-wrapper",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:`hero-role ${fade?'fade-in':'fade-out'}`,children:roles[roleIndex]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"typing-cursor",children:"|"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"hero-cta",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("a",{href:"https://www.linkedin.com/in/shivanichowdary/",target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer",className:"btn btn-secondary",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:faLinkedin,style:{marginRight:'8px'}}),"LinkedIn"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("a",{href:"https://github.com/ShivaniAtukuri",target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer",className:"btn btn-secondary",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:faGithub,style:{marginRight:'8px'}}),"GitHub"]})]})]})});};export default Hero;
